kalaka sita mana bala bala siti des wides drohi balawegawalata rahaniwa methek pahadiliwa kelin siti aanduwa awasana mohothe konda namana hadak pene.aanduwe siyalu 'kuppa kam' siyalla iwasa sitiyath bahutharak wana aandu hadana sakriya janaya aanduwa atha hara yana thiranathmaka sandhisthanaya meyayi.methek srujuwa janadhipathiwaraya pawa peni siti "me kapa thibena thuru polis ha idam balathala nodemiyi" yana piliwethen aath wima yanu 'aandu hadana janathawage' awasan balaporoththuwada kada wi yamayi.in ehata aandu balaya ahimi kara ganimata aanduwata wadi 'wehesak' dariya yuthu nowe.
